description: This file defines REST API routes for managing todo items, including CRUD operations, using FastAPI framework. It handles listing, creating, retrieving, updating, completing, and deleting todos, utilizing SQLite as the database backend.

methods.name: dict row_to_todo(row: sqlite3.Row)
methods.description: Converts a SQLite row to a dictionary representing a todo item.

methods.name: get_todos(db: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles GET /todos to retrieve all todo items.

methods.name: create_todo(todo: TodoCreate, db: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles POST /todos to create a new todo.

methods.name: get_todo(todo_id: int, db: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles GET /todos/{todo_id} to retrieve a specific todo.

methods.name: update_todo(todo_id: int, todo: TodoUpdate, db: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles PUT /todos/{todo_id} to update an existing todo.

methods.name: complete_todo(todo_id: int, completion: TodoComplete, db: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles PATCH /todos/{todo_id}/complete to toggle or set completion status.

methods.name: delete_todo(todo_id: int, db: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles DELETE /todos/{todo_id} to delete a todo.

ctags.name: complete_todo
ctags.pattern: /^def complete_todo(todo_id: int, completion: TodoComplete, db: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_d/
ctags.signature: (todo_id: int, completion: TodoComplete, db: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: update_todo
ctags.pattern: /^def update_todo(todo_id: int, todo: TodoUpdate, db: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db)):$/
ctags.signature: (todo_id: int, todo: TodoUpdate, db: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db))
